price: Dan tidak ada sesuatu pun, melainkan pada sisi Kamilah khazanahnya;434) Kami tidak menurunkannya melainkan dengan ukuran tertentu.
arabic: وَإِن مِّن شَيۡءٍ إِلَّا عِندَنَا خَزَآئِنُهُۥ وَمَا نُنَزِّلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِقَدَرٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ
footnotes: *434) Segala sesuatu itu sumbernya dari Allah -Subḥānahu wata'ālā-.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in min shayin illā ʿindanā khazāinuhu wamā nunazziluhu illā biqadarin maʿlūmin
